compatibility.notes: The HPND-export-US-modify license is permissive and allows for broad compatibility with other permissive licenses. However, it is incompatible with copyleft licenses such as GPL.

key_requirements: Do not use the name of M.I.T. in advertising or publicity without written permission.
Provide the software 'as is' without any warranty.
license.name: HPND-export-US-modify
obligations: Include the copyright notice in all copies of the software.
Include the permission notice in supporting documentation.
Label modified software as modified and do not distribute it in a way that confuses it with the original software.
Obtain a specific export license from the U.S. Government if exporting the software.
